title: 59. To set up a virtual private network between your office network and Google Cloud Platform and have the routes automatically updated when the network topology changes, what is the minimal number of each type of component you need to implement?
alternatives: A. 2 Cloud VPN Gateways and 1 Peer Gateway
B. 1 Cloud VPN Gateway, 1 Peer Gateway, and 1 Cloud Router
C. 2 Peer Gateways and 1 Cloud Router
D. 2 Cloud VPN Gateways and 1 Cloud Router
